|blank2_info = |blank3_name = |blank3_info = |website = |footnotes = }} Chuquisaca is a department in Bolivia. The capital city is Sucre, which is also the capital of Bolivia. El Palmar Integrated Management Natural Area is in the department. == Provinces == The department is divided into 10 provinces which are further subdivided into municipalities and cantons.
